TopicTitle: When game paused, could not adjust the manoeuvre node

Articles.Content: Since i purchased and started to play the game. I could not adjust the manoeuvre node when game was paused and missed the AP window to adjust my trajectory to change to orbit. It is still not working, even if i try and restart the game several times. I even created a new game and the result was the same.
I am also experiencing the same bug. Makes using nodes to circularize the orbit very time sensitive.
